Class StatefulWidget<C extends Context>

java.lang.Object
clutter.abstractwidgets.Widget

clutter.abstractwidgets.StatefulWidget<C>

Direct Known Subclasses:
Application, CheckBox, CycleButton, InputText, Screen, TableDesignRow, TableRowsColumn, TablesModeRow, ValueCell
public abstract class StatefulWidget<C extends Context> extends WidgetBuilder<C>
A widget that can have state.
